SEARCH
Package org.jfree.chart.axis

Class PeriodAxis

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
org.jfree.chart.axis.Axis
org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis
org.jfree.chart.axis.PeriodAxis
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class PeriodAxis extends ValueAxis implements Block, Cloneable, Serializable
An axis that displays a date scale based on a RegularTimePeriod. This axis works when displayed across the bottom or top of a plot, but is broken for display at the left or right of charts.
See Also:

      public void setRange(Range range, boolean turnOffAutoRange, boolean notify)

    • reserveSpace

      public AxisSpace reserveSpace(Graphics2D g2, Plot plot, Rectangle2D plotArea, org.jfree.ui.RectangleEdge edge, AxisSpace space)
      Estimates the space (height or width) required to draw the axis.
      Overrides:
      reserveSpace in class ValueAxis
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      plot - the plot that the axis belongs to.
      plotArea - the area within which the plot (including axes) should be drawn.
      edge - the axis location.
      space - space already reserved.
      Returns:
      The space required to draw the axis (including pre-reserved space).

    • arrangeFN

      protected ArrangeResult arrangeFN(Graphics2D g2, double fixedWidth, ArrangeParams params)
      Returns the size of the axis given a fixed width but no height constraint. We override the base class method to handle the multiple bands that can be displayed by this axis.
      Overrides:
      arrangeFN in class ValueAxis
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      fixedWidth - the fixed *content* width.
      params - the layout parameters (null not permitted).
      Returns:
      The layout result (including the *content* size).

    • arrangeFR

      protected ArrangeResult arrangeFR(Graphics2D g2, double fixedWidth, Range heightRange, ArrangeParams params)
      Arranges the axis with a fixed width and a variable height. This usually means the axis is horizontal, but it doesn't have to be that way.
      Overrides:
      arrangeFR in class ValueAxis
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      fixedWidth - the fixed *content* width.
      heightRange - the height range.
      params - the layout parameters (null not permitted).
      Returns:
      The layout result (including the *content* size)..

    • drawTickLabels

      protected AxisState drawTickLabels(int band, Graphics2D g2, AxisState state, Rectangle2D area, org.jfree.ui.RectangleEdge location)
      Draws the tick labels for one "band" of time periods.
      Parameters:
      band - the band index (zero-based).
      g2 - the graphics device.
      state - the axis state.
      area - the axis area.
      location - the location of the axis relative to the plot.
      Returns:

    • refreshTicks

      public List refreshTicks(Graphics2D g2, AxisState state, Rectangle2D dataArea, org.jfree.ui.RectangleEdge edge)

      Specified by:
      refreshTicks in class Axis
      Parameters:

      state - the axis state.
      dataArea - the area inside the axes.

      Returns:

    • valueToJava2D

      public double valueToJava2D(double value, Rectangle2D area, org.jfree.ui.RectangleEdge edge)
      Converts a data value to a coordinate in Java2D space, assuming that the axis runs along one edge of the specified dataArea.

      Note that it is possible for the coordinate to fall outside the area.

      Specified by:
      valueToJava2D in class ValueAxis
      Parameters:
      value - the data value.
      area - the area for plotting the data.
      edge - the edge along which the axis lies.
      Returns:
      The Java2D coordinate.

    • java2DToValue

      public double java2DToValue(double java2DValue, Rectangle2D area, org.jfree.ui.RectangleEdge edge)
      Converts a coordinate in Java2D space to the corresponding data value, assuming that the axis runs along one edge of the specified dataArea.
      Specified by:
      java2DToValue in class ValueAxis
      Parameters:
      java2DValue - the coordinate in Java2D space.
      area - the area in which the data is plotted.
      edge - the edge along which the axis lies.
      Returns:
      The data value.
